channel.title: Steve Jobs on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Steve Jobs on PR

item.title: Book recommendation : Creativity Inc by Ed Catmull
item.description: It is no surprise that you know about Pixar if you are even remotely knew Steve Jobs and his history. And you definitely heard about Pixar’s movies Toy story, Finding Nemo, Wall-E, Up & more.

item.title: Don't Kill Google Reader
item.description: Larry, if all these are because of Steve’s advice. Learn one important attribute of Steve, his ability to change his mind.

item.title: RIP - Steven P. Jobs
item.description: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
